required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: First Line Ovarian Cancer Treatment - Cohort Study
clinical_study.official_title: Non Interventional Study Dealing With the Use of Bevacizumab (Avastin®) in Patients With Epithelial Ovarian Cancer, Fallopian Tube or Primary Peritoneal and Treated in First-line Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: The French cooperative group GINECO proposes to implement an observational study to describe a real situation, in daily practice tolerance and methods of administration of bevacizumab (Avastin ®)

detailed_description.textblock: Population: Patients aged 18 years and older with an epithelial ovarian cancer, fallopian tube or primary peritoneal or witch it was decided to initiate a process comprising of Bevacizumab (Avastin ®) in first-line therapy

primary_outcome.measure: Safety according to CTCAE v4.0 criteria
primary_outcome.time_frame: Patient will be followed dureing 36 months
primary_outcome.description: To assess patient safety and the tolerance of bevacizumab andministered regarding the daily practice of the oncologist.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Patient will be followed during 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: • Evaluate the efficacy of bevacizumab (Avastin ®) in terms of progression-free survival (PFS) .

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Patient will be followed during 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluate the efficacy of the treatment that will be administered at the disease relapse.
Discribe the population that will be registered to make correlation with the safety and efficacy measure

secondary_outcome.measure: Indication and cons indication of bevacizumab in clinical practice
secondary_outcome.description: Discribe the reason why patient receive or not bevacizumab in first line of ovarian cancer treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of monitoring practices of bevacizumab
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The patients will be followed during 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: Discribe the method that are used during a treatment by bevacizumab in the daily practice

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of the modality of use of bevacizumab
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The patients will be followed during 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: Discribe how bevacizumab is administered in the daily practice

arm_group.arm_group_label: Use of bevacizumab (Avastin ®) - First-line ovarian cancer
arm_group.description: Patient receiving bevacizumab in ovarian cancer first line treatment

intervention.description: Observation of bevacizumab administration in first line ovarian cancer treatment
intervention.arm_group_label: Use of bevacizumab (Avastin ®) - First-line ovarian cancer

study_pop.textblock: • Patients with epithelial ovarian cancer, fallopian tube or peritoneal with treatment receiving Bevacizumab (Avastin ®) in first-line therapy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients aged 18 years and over,
- Patients with an epithelial ovarian cancer, fallopian tube or peritoneal who will receive bevacizumab (Avastin ®) in first-line therapy
- Patients should be informed of the study orally and should not have any objection their data to be processed.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient participation in a clinical trial
- Patient non-affiliated to a social security scheme.

overall_official.affiliation: ICO de l'Ouest, Site René Gauducheau - Saint-Herblain
